```{r}
gapminder <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carpentries-incubator/open-science-with-r/gh-pages/data/gapminder.csv')
```

## Plot

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
gapminder %>% 
  filter(country == "Canada") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = gdpPerCap))
```
